name: Merged Dimensions
description:
Merged Dimensions

You are the world's last stand, the only one who's got the power to prevent the worlds from collapsing. Use your dimensional magic to save the world !

Controls :

WASD - Movements

E / RMB - Swap Dimensions

LMB - Shoot

This game was made for the 48h GMTK Game Jam 2021 by Towa and Blurry.
